c74object.name: wa.launchpad.button
c74object.description:
Interact with a single button of a Novation Launchpad Mini.
Can be used in 2 modes: click and toggle.
"click" is active for as long as the button is pressed.
"toggle" is active between to consecutive button presses.
Needs a wa.launchpad.device

entry.name: active
entry.description:
In "click"mode active is 1 for as long as the button is pressed.
In "toggle" mode active is 1 between to consecutive button presses.

objarg.name: id
objarg.digest: The midi ID of the pad
objarg.description:
Set the midi ID of the pad.
see setButton for details.

attribute.name: color
attribute.digest: the color of the inactive pad
attribute.description:
set the color of the inactive pad.
see the color message for overview of colors

attribute.name: downColor
attribute.digest: the color of the active pad
attribute.description:
set the color of the active pad.
see the color message for overview of colors

attribute.name: toggle
attribute.description: set to 1 to make this a toggle pad

method.name: color
method.digest: the color of the inactive pad
method.description:
set the color of the inactive pad.
accepts RGB hex values

method.name: downColor
method.digest: the color of the active pad
method.description:
the color of the active pad
accepts RGB hex values

method.name: forceActive
method.description:
force the active state of the pad.
not really relevant for a clickable pad.

method.name: setButton
method.digest: set the midi ID of the pad

method.name: toggle
method.description: set to 1 to make this button a toggle
